metadata.title: Meetings and Boards
metadata.description: Efficiently manage shareholder meetings and board meetings with Sttok, including convocations, delegations, votes, and minutes.
metadata.keywords: shareholder meetings, board meetings, digital meeting management, convocations, vote delegations, digital minutes

hero.title: Meetings and Boards
hero.description: At Sttok, we understand the importance of meetings and boards for the proper functioning and decision-making in a company. With Sttok, you can convene, manage delegations, votes, and generate minutes and certificates digitally in just a few minutes.

topFeatures.title: Main Features
topFeatures.description: Optimize the management of meetings and boards with tools that simplify each step of the process.

items.title: Digital Convocation
items.description: Send digital convocations with all necessary information to your shareholders and board members in one click.

items.title: Vote and Delegation Management
items.description: Allow shareholders to delegate their votes and manage voting securely and transparently.

items.title: Automatic Minutes Generation
items.description: Create meeting minutes and certificates of agreements automatically in just a few minutes.

features.title: All Features
features.description: Explore all the features that make our product unique.

items.title: Meeting Convocation
items.description: Create and send meeting convocations to shareholders and board members digitally, with all relevant details.

items.title: Digital Vote Delegations
items.description: Facilitate secure vote delegation, allowing partners to represent their interests in meetings.

items.title: Electronic Voting
items.description: Manage agreement voting with full transparency and efficiency, ensuring real-time results.

items.title: Automatic Minutes
items.description: Generate minutes and certificates of agreements at the end of each meeting, saving time and eliminating errors.

items.title: Certifications
items.description: Automatic generation of certifications for convocations, delegations, and voting.

items.title: Meeting History
items.description: Access the complete history of all previous meetings and agreements, all stored in the cloud.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Read testimonials from satisfied clients who use Sttok for Meetings or Boards.

items.name: Johan Longo
items.description: Sttok helps us keep all the information about partners, meetings, and incentive plans of our company organized. It facilitates the management of the cap table and the relationship with investors.

items.name: Lucía Bouzá
items.description: Sttok allows us to have all the information about partners and incentive plans centralized and updated. It facilitates the management of meetings and the relationship with investors.

items.name: Oriol Miralbell
items.description: Sttok allows you to easily calculate valuations, investment rounds, and simulations. The application interface is simple and intuitive, which allows you to make decisions more quickly and effectively.

items.name: Nacho González
items.description: Now with Sttok you can perform simulations of capital increases or convertible notes. We also easily manage our team's phantom shares. Finally, as an investor, I have my investments organized and I clearly know what I have.
